src:
Nya Alerischefens uppdrag: Få ordning på Sverige
Sofia Palmquists främsta uppdrag som ny vd för Investors gamla surdeg Aleris blir att bota den krassliga svenska verksamheten.  Det säger ordförande Thomas Berglund, som nyligen liksom sin nya vd bytte arbetsgivare från Capio till Aleris.
04 Nov 2019, 16:43 by Martin Lindgren

text:
New Alerish manager's assignment: Get order in Sweden
Sofia Palmquist's main assignment as new CEO of Investor's old sourdough Aleris is to cure the tough Swedish business. This is stated by Chairman Thomas Berglund, who recently, like his new CEO, switched employers from Capio to Aleris.
04 Nov 2019, 16:43 by Martin Lindgren
